titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 96) proposing a tax limitation amendment to the Constitution of the United States.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-503, by Mr. Sessions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 170.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 439.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/11/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.J. Res. 96 (tax limitation constitutional amendment).
